title: PATCH 5.5 GAME CRASH PROBLEMS
body: ok, so i opened my lol launcher, waited for a match, picked a champion and as soon as everyone was 100 % in the loading screen, the game crashed and i tried to reconnect and crashes again.. my ping is about 50 which is not that bad and i use macbook pro. Before the patch 5.5 everything was good and perfect.... PLEASE RIOT HELP! i want to play some free champ{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I have the same problem, I'm also using a macbook pro and it has NEVER crashed before this last patch. It's happened twice in probably the last 10 games or so. Way to often - thats 20% of games. I've yet to hear of any solution to this, I just hope riot can step it up on the mac client instead of neglecting it and sweeping its problems under the rug.
